string.value: I've reached a limit to my training as a warrior. Is there a level beyond this? I should ask #b#p2020008##k who helped me with the third job advancement.
#b#p2020008##k told me to see the bishop #b#p2081100##k in Minar Forest if I want to find the path of becoming a greater warrior.
#b#p2081100##k said he will guide me to the path that will lead me to the warriors' extreme power.

It's been a quite a while since I've last seen you. I'm happy to see you improved so much. Do you realize the hidden strength within you? You must have some reason to see me. What can I do for you?\r\n#b#L0# I want the 4th Job advancement.#l
Yes. I was expecting you. But I'm not strong enough to make your wish come true. Go to #bMinar forest#k. #b#p2081100##k who is training there will be able to help you. Do you want to see him?
I'll recommend you to him. Hope you get stronger!
Aren't you here to do the 4th job advancement? If not, that's fine.
Why do you want to see me, young warrior..\r\n#b#L0# I want the 4th job advancement. Here is #p2020008#'s recommendaton.#l
#b#p2020008##k?... Is he the one in El Nath? Then I can trust you.
A young warrior who wants increase their power. I have to tell you something. Talk to me only if you're ready to hear the truth. Many secrets will be revealed...
Remember. Bishop of Minar forest, #b#p2081100##k. Please see him.
You lost #b#t4031342##k? I will write another recommendation but don't lose this one!
